FuncDef: The display garp timer command displays values of GARP timers.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays GARP statistics on a specific interface:
<ifType>: specifies the type of the interface.<ifNum>: specifies the number of the interface.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check GARP timer values, run the display garp timer command. Note that:
If interface interface-type interface-number is not specified in the command, GARP timer values on all interfaces are displayed.If interface interface-type interface-number is specified in the command, GARP timer values on a specific interface are displayed.
